body:
Hello, as many of you may know there is this event called dreamhack. On the event tournaments get streamed,you can meet famous people or just play in big lan halls.
 2016 will be a big year for dreamhack and the event will be hosted in many countries. Me myself have decided to go to dreamhack Masters, a csgo tournament hold in "Malmö" in april. The tickets are getting launched the 14th. I will also go to dreamhack summer in Sweden with the hope of meeting people I loved to watch as a squeaker.

So I was gonna ask, are you gonna attend to any events? Will you watch the tournaments? And would you like to go if you had the oppertunity?
body_tagged:

title: Dreamhack & Dreamhack Masters

replies.body:
I follow all the csgo majors and so far dream hacks have been some of the best. Unfortunately I doubt I will ever attend one however I'm looking forward to watching them.

leipzig in 7 days, gonna be good

replies.body:
Pretty sure I'mma attend Gfinity this year if I'm allowed LOL. I watch some tournaments, nowhere near as much as when I had +200 from betting. 

I am also playing ESEA Open this season with ma boys :)
